00045 #include <cmath>
00046 #include "BBox.h"
00047 #include "Vector3D.h"
00048 #include "Ray.h"
00049 
00050 const double Infinity = HUGE_VAL;
00051  
00052 BBox::BBox()
00053 : pMin( Infinity,  Infinity,  Infinity ), pMax( -Infinity, -Infinity, -Infinity ) 
00054 {
00055 }
00056 
00057 BBox::BBox( const Point3D& point ) 
00058 : pMin(point), pMax(point) 
00059 { 
00060 }
00061 
00062 BBox::BBox( const Point3D& point1, const Point3D& point2 ) 
00063 {
00064         pMin = Point3D( std::min( point1.x, point2.x ),
00065                                     std::min( point1.y, point2.y ),
00066                                     std::min( point1.z, point2.z ) );
00067         pMax = Point3D( std::max( point1.x, point2.x ),
00068                                     std::max( point1.y, point2.y ),
00069                                     std::max( point1.z, point2.z) );
00070 }
00071 
00072 bool BBox::Overlaps( const BBox& bbox ) const 
00073 {
00074         bool xOverlap = ( pMax.x >= bbox.pMin.x ) && ( pMin.x <= bbox.pMax.x );
00075         bool yOverlap = ( pMax.y >= bbox.pMin.y ) && ( pMin.y <= bbox.pMax.y);
00076         bool zOverlap = ( pMax.z >= bbox.pMin.z ) && ( pMin.z <= bbox.pMax.z);
00077         return ( xOverlap && yOverlap && zOverlap );
00078 }
00079 
00080 bool BBox::Inside( const Point3D& point) const 
00081 {
00082         return ( point.x >= pMin.x && point.x <= pMax.x &&
00083              point.y >= pMin.y && point.y <= pMax.y &&
00084              point.z >= pMin.z && point.z <= pMax.z );
00085 }
00086 
00087 void BBox::Expand( double delta ) 
00088 {
00089         pMin -= Vector3D( delta, delta, delta );
00090         pMax += Vector3D( delta, delta, delta );
00091 }
00092 
00093 double BBox::Volume() const 
00094 {
00095         Vector3D diagonal = pMax - pMin;
00096         return diagonal.x * diagonal.y * diagonal.z;
00097 }
00098 
00099 int BBox::MaximumExtent() const 
00100 {
00101         Vector3D diagonal = pMax - pMin;
00102         if( diagonal.x > diagonal.y && diagonal.x > diagonal.z) return 0;
00103         else if( diagonal.y > diagonal.z) return 1;
00104         else return 2;
00105 }
00106 
00107 void BBox::BoundingSphere( Point3D* center, float* radius ) const
00108 {
00109     *center = 0.5 * ( pMin + pMax );
00110     *radius = Distance( *center, pMax );
00111 }
00112 
00113 bool BBox::IntersectP( const Ray& ray, double* hitt0, double* hitt1 ) const
00114 {
00115     double t0 = ray.mint;
00116     double t1 = ray.maxt;
00117     
00118     for( int i = 0; i < 3; ++i )
00119     {
00120         double invRayDir = 1.0 / ray.direction[i];
00121         double tNear = ( pMin[i] - ray.origin[i] ) * invRayDir;
00122         double tFar = ( pMax[i] - ray.origin[i] ) * invRayDir;
00123         if( tNear > tFar ) std::swap( tNear, tFar );
00124         t0 = tNear > t0 ? tNear : t0;
00125         t1 = tFar < t1 ? tFar : t1;
00126         if( t0 > t1 ) return false;
00127     }
00128     if( hitt0 ) *hitt0 = t0;
00129     if( hitt1 ) *hitt1 = t1;
00130     return true;
00131 }
00132 
00133 std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream& os, const BBox& bbox )
00134 {
00135     os << "pMin: " << bbox.pMin << std::endl;
00136     os << "pMax: " << bbox.pMax << std::endl;
00137     return os;
00138 }
00139 
00140 BBox Union( const BBox& bbox, const Point3D& point )
00141 {
00142         BBox result;
00143         result.pMin.x = std::min( bbox.pMin.x, point.x );
00144         result.pMin.y = std::min( bbox.pMin.y, point.y );
00145         result.pMin.z = std::min( bbox.pMin.z, point.z );
00146         result.pMax.x = std::max( bbox.pMax.x, point.x );
00147         result.pMax.y = std::max( bbox.pMax.y, point.y );
00148         result.pMax.z = std::max( bbox.pMax.z, point.z );
00149         return result;
00150 }
00151 
00152 BBox Union( const BBox& bbox1, const BBox& bbox2 )
00153 {
00154         BBox result;
00155         result.pMin.x = std::min( bbox1.pMin.x, bbox2.pMin.x);
00156         result.pMin.y = std::min( bbox1.pMin.y, bbox2.pMin.y );
00157         result.pMin.z = std::min( bbox1.pMin.z, bbox2.pMin.z );
00158         result.pMax.x = std::max( bbox1.pMax.x, bbox2.pMax.x );
00159         result.pMax.y = std::max( bbox1.pMax.y, bbox2.pMax.y);
00160         result.pMax.z = std::max( bbox1.pMax.z, bbox2.pMax.z ); 
00161         return result;
00162 }
